Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Toccata in G major, BWV 916

no later than c. 1712–1713

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

The Neue Bach-Ausgabe also gives the second and third sections in an embellished version according to a copy by Johann Christoph Bach, and the second section in an embellished version according to a copy by Johann Gottlieb Preller.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 9/1 · BA 5091-01 · Toccaten · ed. Peter Woolny [including further versions]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5235 · Toccaten · ed. Peter Woolny [including further versions]
  • Henle · HN 126 · Toccaten · ed. Rudolf Steglich
  • Henle · HN 127 · Toccaten · ed. Rudolf Steglich
  • Henle · HN 1126 · Toccaten · ed. Rudolf Steglich
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50081 · Toccaten · ed. Christian Eisert [including further version]

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 3
